title: Practical Competency Enhancement Course Based on Engineering Design and Manufacturing Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment providing practical applicability for learners with work experience

learning_goals: Learners can complete engineering design projects addressing real-world industrial problems through group collaboration
Learners can implement the entire design-manufacturing-testing process using digital tools (3D modeling, simulation software, etc.) to produce prototypes
Learners can analyze project outcomes according to quantitative/qualitative evaluation criteria and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
